text.div:
ClaimType

The type or discipline-style of the claim

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/claim-type-link defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
institutional Institutional A claim for Institution based, typically in-patient, goods and services.
oral Oral Health A claim for Oral Health (Dentist, Denturist, Hygienist) goods and services.
pharmacy Pharmacy A claim for Pharmacy based goods and services.
professional Professional A claim for Professional, typically out-patient, goods and services.
vision Vision A claim for Vision (Opthamologist, Optometrist and Optician) goods and services.

name: ClaimType
description: The type or discipline-style of the claim
